name: Classic Greek Salad
ingredients: 1 green bell pepper, cut into rings
instructions: Cut tomatoes into wedges and place in large bowl
Add sliced cucumber, red onion, and bell pepper
Add Kalamata olives to the bowl
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, and oregano
Pour dressing over vegetables and toss gently
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Let salad sit for 10 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld
Serve at room temperature or chilled
notes: For authentic Greek flavor, use good quality feta and don't skimp on the olive oil. This salad is best served fresh but can be refrigerated for up to 2 days.
